name: Devised Theatre
description: An in-depth study of devising theatre in a group context. This course offers an intensive exploration of the history and practice of devised theatre within the late 20th and early 21st centuries that will culminate in a number of in-class and public performances.
department: Centre for Drama, Theatre and Performance Studies
prerequisites: Minimum 70% in required courses: DRM100Y1/DRM101Y1/(UNI102H1, UNI106H1)/UNI102Y1; DRM200Y1 or permission of the Drama Centre.
